title: Stronghold 2 Bonus Map 2007
description:
Stronghold 2 Bonus Map



Before installing the bonus map please make sure Stronghold 2 is installed on your computer.  To install the bonus map run the ÃƒÂ¢??Stronghold 2 Bonus Map.exeÃƒÂ¢?? and follow the on-screen installation instructions.  The installation will automatically locate your Stronghold 2 installation and install the bonus map to the correct location.

To play the bonus map load Stronghold 2 and click on Siege in the Path of War.  The map will be displayed in the siege list on the right hand side.

Happy sieging Sire!
